name: grapes
reason: Toxic to dogs and can cause kidney failure.

name: chocolate
reason: Contains theobromine, which is toxic to dogs.

name: carrots
reason: A healthy snack for dogs in moderation.

name: chicken
reason: Cooked chicken is a good source of protein for dogs.

name: onions
reason: Can cause anemia in dogs by damaging red blood cells.

name: avocado
reason: Contains persin, which can be harmful in large amounts.
